abilities.description: Charge: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.ed343c963b08f301]{Enter the Fray} +heart atop your elephant, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

Siege Engine: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage} by tearing down defensive structures or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.c8bacc17f73d3103]{Face Danger} within the howdah atop your elephant, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

Rampage: After you have intoxicated your elephant and order it to @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.7e008d0f656dc8b3]{Clash}, inflict +2 harm on a hit. On a weak hit or miss, there is collateral damage. Pay the Price and make it worse.
